code: import{FETCH_BOOKS,FETCH_BOOK,ADD_TO_CART,DELETE_FROM_CART,UPDATE_CART_QUANTITY,EMPTY_CART,FETCH_REVIEWS,SORT_BOOKS,SELECT_AUTHOR,SELECT_PUBLISHER,SEE_MORE}from'./types';export var fetchBooks=function fetchBooks(url){return function(dispatch){fetch(url).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(books){return dispatch({type:FETCH_BOOKS,payload:books});});};};export var seeMore=function seeMore(type){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SEE_MORE,payload:type});};};export var fetchBook=function fetchBook(url){return function(dispatch){fetch(url).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(book){return dispatch({type:FETCH_BOOK,payload:book});});};};export var addtoCart=function addtoCart(book){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:book});};};export var selectAuthor=function selectAuthor(author){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SELECT_AUTHOR,payload:author});};};export var selectPublisher=function selectPublisher(publisher){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SELECT_PUBLISHER,payload:publisher});};};export var emptyCart=function emptyCart(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPTY_CART,payload:null});};};export var sortBooks=function sortBooks(item,option){return function(dispatch){if(item!=undefined){console.log("dddd vvv ccc xx : ",item);var sorted=[];if(option=='plowToHigh'){sorted=item.books.data.sort(function(a,b){return parseFloat(a.old_price)-parseFloat(b.old_price);});}else if(option=='phighToLow'){sorted=item.books.data.sort(function(a,b){return parseFloat(b.old_price)-parseFloat(a.old_price);});}else if(option=='dlowToHigh'){sorted=item.books.data.sort(function(a,b){return parseFloat(a.discount)-parseFloat(b.discount);});}else if(option=='dhighToLow'){sorted=item.books.data.sort(function(a,b){return parseFloat(b.discount)-parseFloat(a.discount);});}dispatch({type:SORT_BOOKS,payload:{success:true,author:item.author?item.author:null,publisher:item.publisher?item.publisher:null,category:item.category?item.category:null,books:{current_page:item.books.current_page,data:sorted,first_page_url:item.books.first_page_url,from:item.books.from,last_page:item.books.last_page,last_page_url:item.books.last_page_url,path:item.books.path,per_page:item.books.per_page,prev_page_url:item.books.prev_page_url,to:item.books.to,total:item.books.total}},selectedOption:option});}};};export var deleteFromCart=function deleteFromCart(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:DELETE_FROM_CART,payload:id});};};export var updateCartQuantity=function updateCartQuantity(id,quantity){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_CART_QUANTITY,payload:id,quantity:quantity});};};export var fetchReviews=function fetchReviews(url){return function(dispatch){fetch(url).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(review){return dispatch({type:FETCH_REVIEWS,payload:review});});};};
